JUDGES: Anatoly Kovler;Elisabeth Steiner;Erik Møse;Julia Laffranque;Mirjana Lazarova Trajkovska;Peer Lorenzen
TEXT: CARDINAL . NORP The applicant , PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in GPE . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) are represented by PERSON , ORG at ORG .
CARDINAL . NORP The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

CARDINAL . By the judgment of DATE the justice of peace of ORG of LOC awarded the applicant damages in the total amount of MONEY ( RUB ) against PERSON The writ of execution for the abovementioned amount was issued on DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG returned the unenforced writ of execution to the applicant because the document did not contain the information on the date and place of birth of the debtor and his place of work .

CARDINAL . The applicant complained about the bailiff ’s actions to court . On DATE the ORG allowed the complaint in part . The court ruled the bailiff ’s actions unlawful , annulled the decision to return the writ of execution and ordered the bailiff to institute enforcement proceedings . On DATE ORG , acting on appeal , found that the writ of execution had indeed been defective and that the bailiff could have returned it for correction to the court , but not to the applicant . The appeal court removed the order to institute enforcement proceedings upholding the rest of the judgment . The applicant did not re - submit the writ of execution to the bailiffs’ service as it was prescribed by the domestic law .
CARDINAL . On DATE the justice of peace of ORG of LOC , acting on the applicant ’s claim , ordered indexation of the recovered amount to RUB MONEY ( MONEY ( ORG ) ) .
CARDINAL . It appears that the judgment has not been enforced to date .
